channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots have to get a picture of a rare bird for Abuela in 'Catch The Quickatoo', then in 'Lost Lorito', Dora and Boots return a baby parrot home, who can't stop copying Boots. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: The Smurfs recruit a new fire brigade in 'Smurfs on Fire', then in 'The Sarsaparilla Run', Papa Smurf is excited to pick the magic Sarsaparillo plant, but he's not the only one. (S2, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Dollhouse Dress Up Chest: Gabby and Pandy go on a dress-up adventure in the dollhouse, wearing different costumes to help the Gabby Cats get out of some sticky situations. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Garbage Truck Challenge: Blaze is competing in the ultimate trash-themed race, but Crusher is racing too, and he'll do anything to crush the competition. Who will come out on top? (S8, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Arrby recruits a crew to gather magical seeds in 'Pups Save the Meerkat Pirates', and in 'Pups Save a Hum-Hippo', Mayor Humdinger wants a hippo as his new hench-animal, but it gallops off! (S10, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Digi and Tal's inventions go haywire in 'Pups Save a Runaway Robo-Chicken Purse', then in 'Pups Save the Buggy Trekkers', Humdinger squeezes himself into the dune buggy race. (S10, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Cows: The children are at the Elf Farm, but to learn where milk comes from they must visit a big farm, to find cows. They travel to Lucy Big's farm, where she shows them all the animals.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Windmill: King Thistle wants bread for his royal breakfast, but there isn't any flour in the castle. Mr Elf takes everyone to the Elf Windmill to find out why it takes so long to make flour.

channel.desc: No Magic Day: For an entire day the Kingdom has to make do without help from magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Ruff-Ruff Pack steals Mr. Porter's donut maker in 'Pups save the Donuts', then in 'Pups save the Kitties', The Ruff-Ruff Pack takes over Humdinger's lair and run off with his kitties. (S7, ep 22).
